child.pub-comments: The author's sureness of this group is signalled by his position on page 10 thus: "Any study that contradicts the Akedoid hypothesis put forward here must show that there is an alternative hypothesis in which the evidence is stronger than what I have presented. I have not yet found a WBC group that can be related to Akpes and AIKA the way I have found it for Edoid..."

child.pub-comments: The author, on page 8, says that "the classification of Oko remains an enigma … this is one reason why we should be careful how we propose a classification for Okoid". He is not sure whether Okoid should be placed inside Nupoid, or allowed to stand as a direct descendant of West Benue-Congo, he says the issue remains open.
